EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience Estimate timing delivery
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Timing needed for an experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Planning Team,
You have to determine the timing of the delivery for the Experience: {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.Name}. When it is done, please update the Experience on the application: Link.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
